meanings.definition: A young man who works at a beach, typically selling snacks or renting out equipment.
meanings.sent1: The beachboy handed out ice cream cones to the visitors.
meanings.sent2: The beachboy's job involves renting umbrellas and chairs to beachgoers.
meanings.sent3: The beachboy joked that he could sell sand to a desert.
meanings.sent4: The beachboy's smile was as bright as the sun reflecting off the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The beachboy's tan skin showed he spent his days under the sun at work.

meanings.definition: A member of the American rock band The Beach Boys.
meanings.sent1: My uncle used to be a beachboy in The Beach Boys band.
meanings.sent2: The beachboy played the guitar and sang harmoniously with the group.
meanings.sent3: The beachboy's favorite song to perform was 'Surfin' USA'.
meanings.sent4: The beachboy's music was like a wave of nostalgia crashing over the audience.
meanings.sent5: The beachboy's stage presence was as captivating as the ocean's waves.

meanings.definition: A boy who spends a lot of time at the beach.
meanings.sent1: The beachboy built sandcastles every day during his summer vacation.
meanings.sent2: The beachboy loved collecting seashells along the shore.
meanings.sent3: The beachboy's friends teased him about turning into a mermaid.
meanings.sent4: The beachboy's laughter echoed like seagulls soaring above the waves.
meanings.sent5: The beachboy's memories of the beach were etched in the sands of time.
